description: Scared but hopeful, Chuck Barron and Michael D'Amours dream of rescue and freedom. Until then, they can only find consolation in each other's companionship and comforting embrace. Like all the other prisoners, they've been hungering for any taste of solace and humanity. Fortunately these two inmates discover they can be each other's savior and they soon lose themselves in their fleshy wonderland with explosive results.
series: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict
title: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict, Scene #07
